oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words in the Katkop dialect, from #k sin (B XXV. 2355
6. 4434 and 4435, 8. 4615 rev., 9. 4653 rev., etc.) . A list of |xam names for parts of the body, including the 'great throat artery', head and neck bones, and sinews.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: parts of the body
